title: Presentación de rOpenSci y el programa de campeones
text: Video y presentación del programa en español. Organizado junto al grupo de usuarios RenBuenosAires.

title: rOpenSci and rOpenSci's Champions Program presentation
text: Video and slides in English presenting rOpenSci and the Champion program. Organize with Abuja R User Group.

title: Become a Mentor for rOpenSci Champions!
text: rOpenSci is seeking mentors to support our inaugural cohort of rOpenSci Champions!

title: ¡Anunciamos el programa de Campeones y Campeonas de rOpenSci!
text: Estos programas se diseñan para identificar, reconocer y premiar a líderes de nuestras comunidades.

title: Contributing Guide
text: The purpose of this guide is to welcome you to rOpenSci and help you recognize yourself as a potential contributor.

title: ropensci-docs GitHub Organization
text: Documentation of rOpenSci packages, automatically updated.
